content: **yarn requirements ** lily® sugar n cream solids 2 5 oz/70 9 g #00004 ecru **16 balls** or bernat® handicrafter cotton solids 1 75 oz/50 g #00002 off white **22 balls** **note ** bag is worked with 2 strands of yarn held together pattern is also available at favecrafts com 1 as crochet tote bag featured on february 2 & 3 2008 calendar pages *lily sugar n cream free project sheet 99000600309* lily sugar n cream version 2 bernat version 3 french version pdf modified march 2009 sac maison de campagne au crochet 4 1 http //www favecrafts com/crochet-bags/crochet-tote-bag/ 2 https //www yarnspirations com/lily-sugarn-cream-cottage-bag/scc0503-003141m html 3 https //www yarnspirations com/ca-en/bernat-cottage-bag/brc0103-005724m html cgid=crochet-patterns-women-bags-purses#start=2 4 https //allocrochethome files wordpress com/2020/08/sac-maison-de-campagne-handicrafter pdf
